summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Maestro Habitat React webapp conversion. All authentication pages, navigation, translations, and protected routes are working correctly. Backend APIs are functional with minor endpoint differences.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 but response is not valid JSON (likely plain text)
Returns 404 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Minor - endpoints may not be implemented yet

passed_tests: Login page loads with correct Maestro Habitat branding and tagline
Login form validation works (empty fields show error)
Invalid login credentials show proper error message
Register page loads with all required fields (name, email, password)
Register form validation works (weak password detection)
Navigation between Login/Register/Forgot Password pages works
Forgot Password page loads and form submission works
All protected routes correctly redirect to login when not authenticated
Translation system working - no translation keys visible in UI
All button and form labels properly translated to English
Password validation shows proper error messages
Google login/register buttons present on both pages
All new pages exist: FAQ, Contact, Billing, Referrals, Reviews, NotificationsSettings, TutorCalendar
Page imports are correct in App.js - all routes defined
Protected route system working for consumer, tutor, and admin roles
